description: Main frontend source file for a Flutter-based personal finance tracker app. It defines the app widget tree, handles routing between login, registration, main app dashboard, and feature screens such as transactions, budgets, and charts. It includes theme configuration, navigation logic, and UI scaffolds for core screens.

classes.name: FinanceTrackerApp
classes.description: Root widget establishing theme and initial route to authentication navigation.

classes.name: AuthNavigation
classes.description: Stateful widget managing whether to show login, register, or main dashboard based on auth state.

classes.name: MainScaffold
classes.description: Main app shell with bottom navigation between key feature screens and logout handling.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: UI for user login, handles login process and errors.

classes.name: RegisterScreen
classes.description: UI for user registration, validates input, handles registration flow.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: Displays recent transactions summary, quick access to add transactions, and navigation to detailed views.

classes.name: TransactionsScreen
classes.description: List of all transactions with options to add, edit, or delete entries.

classes.name: TransactionEditScreen
classes.description: Form for creating a new transaction or editing an existing one, with date picker, validation.

classes.name: BudgetsScreen
classes.description: Shows budgets per category, refreshable list.

classes.name: ChartsScreen
classes.description: Displays analytics such as category spending pie chart and usage instructions.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for each screen or root app.

methods.name: _onAuthenticated
methods.description: Handles successful login by updating state.

methods.name: _onLogout
methods.description: Logs out the user and resets interface to login.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Defines the widget tree for each screen, navigation, and UI components.

methods.name: _deleteTx
methods.description: Confirms and deletes a transaction, then refreshes list.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Handles saving or updating a transaction.

methods.name: _pickDate
methods.description: Opens date picker dialog and updates selected date.
